document_data.name: Epic of Gilgeam
document_data.author: Unknown
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Epic of Gilgeam''''' was an epic poem circulating [[Unther]] during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]] that described in detail the life of [[Gilgeam]].
document_data.Activities: The ''Epic of Gilgeam'' was required by law to be taught in all schools within Unther. Given Gilgeam's rising unpopularity during the mid–14{{th}} century DR, many satirical parodies of specific passages from the ''Epic'' sprung up all over Unther during this time.
